column1: Kata Robata////Went with three of my best friends--ladies nite out--and had a great time with the food!  Waitstaff was quite friendly and very patient with our indecision--too many choices. We decided to try different things on the menu and skip the sushi so can't rate them there--except one of us had the foie gras sushi and she was in heaven.  It was quite spendy for dinner
column2: but we were able to sample and enjoy several fine dishes.
